thread.title: LoveShack Vacations Wins a WeddingWire Couples' Choice Award速 2015
thread.title_full: LoveShack Vacations Wins a WeddingWire Couples' Choice Award速 2015

author: prbuzz.com
title: LoveShack Vacations Wins a WeddingWire Couples' Choice Award速 2015
text:
KHM Travel Group's specialized romance travel program LoveShack Vacations receives award based on outstanding client reviews.
Brunswick, Ohio (8/12/15) - LoveShack Vacations, a part of KHM Travel Group, was recently named winner of the WeddingWire Couples' Choice Awards速 2015 for travel.
LoveShack Vacations is a travel agency dedicated to helping couples plan honeymoons, destination weddings, and other romantic getaways. Based on excellent reviews from past couples and clients, LoveShack Vacations is now recognized in the top five percent of the WeddingWire Network of more than 200,000 wedding professionals. WeddingWire is the nation's top online wedding marketplace, featuring helpful planning information, customer reviews, and directories of vendors for each component of a wedding.
With a current overall average rating of 4.9 out of 5.0, LoveShack Vacations is a top travel vendor for quality of service, responsiveness, professionalism, value, and flexibility. View the ratings and read LoveShack Vacations' reviews on the LoveShack Vacations Wedding Wire page.
"It's always exciting to start the year by honoring the top-rated wedding professionals within the WeddingWire Network who represent more than two million reviews on our website," said Timothy Chi, CEO, WeddingWire. "Each of the businesses recognized are committed to quality, professionalism and all around top-notch service. We applaud LoveShack Vacations for their impressive achievements within the wedding industry."
The WeddingWire Network also includes leading wedding sites such as Project Wedding, Brides.com, Martha Stewart Weddings, and Weddingbee.
Recently, LoveShack Vacations also received awards for Top 10 Sandals and Beaches Agency in the World, Karisma Hotels & Resorts: Top Growth for Gourmet Inclusive Vacation Consultant, and Top 10 El Dorado Royale Producer.
For more information about booking a honeymoon, destination wedding, or couples getaway, visit www.loveshackvacations.com . For more information about becoming a Romance Travel Specialist, visit www.loveshacktravelagents.com .
ABOUT LOVESHACK VACATIONS - LoveShack Vacations is a part of KHM Travel Group, one of the nation's fastest-growing host travel agencies, currently supporting 3,600+ independent home-based travel agents across the United States. Romantic destination expertise and dedication to designing trips around a couple's unique needs make LoveShack Vacations unlike any other travel agency. For more information, visit www.loveshackvacations.com .
Contact:
